snippet.title: 9 Monkeys of Shaolin - Announcement Trailer [NA]
snippet.description: 9 Monkeys of Shaolin marks a true rebirth of the iconic beat 'em up genre in vein of old-school video games. If, as a kid you had hours of fun playing beat 'em up videogames crushing foes left and right then this new title from the creators of hardcore brawler REDEEMER is definitely for you! The game will be available at the 16th of October 2020 for PlayStation®4, Microsoft Xbox®, Nintendo Switch™ and PC both physically and digitally.
